name: Plastic Surgery
text: Plastic surgery is a surgical specialty involving the restoration, reconstruction, or alteration of the human body.

text: Dentistry, also known as dental medicine and oral medicine, is a branch of medicine that consists of the study

name: Eye Care
text: Eye surgery, also known as ocular surgery, is surgery performed on the eye or its adnexa, typically by an ophthalmologist.

name: Cardiology
text: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the cardiovascular system.

name: Neurosurgery
text: Neurosurgery or neurological surgery, known in common parlance as brain surgery, is the medical specialty

name: Cancer Care
text: Cancer is a group of diseases involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body
